name: Frank the Jelly
description:
This is a short demo of Frank the Jelly. 

All modeling, illustration, rigging, game mechanics, animation, and voice acting done by Eric Polley.  ericpolley.com

A comedic game about a Yellow blobbish Jelly character named Frank.

All Game Play.

The goal is to get to the end. 

Please share with your friends if you enjoy this game!

ericpolley.com
